Classes in org.mortbay.jetty.deployer used by org.mortbay.jetty.deployer
ConfigurationManager
          ConfigurationManager Type for allow injection of property values for replacement in jetty xml files during deployment.
 

Classes in org.mortbay.jetty.deployer used by org.mortbay.jetty.xbean
ContextDeployer
          Context Deployer This deployer scans a designated directory by ContextDeployer.setConfigurationDir(String) for the appearance/disappearance or changes to xml configuration files.
